item.description:
REPLIES FOR THOSE WHO WANT TO GO FOR DINNER MUST BE POSTED BY WED MORNING (11-14) SO A RESERVATION CAN BE MADE. THE EARLIEST THEY CAN ACCEPT A RESERVATION IS 7:45 PM. IF YOU DO NOT SAY THAT YOU WILL COME FOR DINNER IT IS ASSUMED YOU WILL NOT BE INCLUDED IN THE RESERVATION.

If you like funky music and dancing all night long (and we do!), don't miss this get-together. Several folks in the meet-up have been to Johnny D's to see this band and had a lot of fun.
www.miloz.com

We will reserve a table for dinner - Johnny D's has good, cheap food. NOTE - There is a cover fee at the door, usually $10. RSVP YES or NO for dinner reservations at 7:30. Band at 9:45
Parking in Davis Square on a Sat. night is not easy - Check Johnny D's website for parking recommendations: (http://www.johnnyds.c...)
Also can take the Red Line in.

This event is being planned by two of our members Barbara and Linda...thanks ladies, sounds like a good time. Nice to offer an event in another area. :-)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Milo Z at Johnny D's
